name: B. Chaya Calendar
statement:
The Chaya tribe believes that there are n signs of the apocalypse. Over
time, it has been found out that the i-th sign occurs every a_i years
(in years a_i, 2
cdot a_i, 3
cdot a_i,
dots).According to the legends, for the apocalypse to happen, the signs
must occur sequentially. That is, first they wait for the first sign to
occur, then strictly after it, the second sign will occur, and so on.
That is, if the i-th sign occurred in the year x, the tribe starts
waiting for the occurrence of the (i+1)-th sign, starting from the year
x+1.In which year will the n-th sign occur and the apocalypse will
happen?
